attributes.action: Give free or reduced fuel to pensioners and all
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Other countries give reduced, free (for pensioners) or base lined fuel costs to all - why can't UK?  

Overseas companies are making HUGE profits from us, fuel companies should be government owned and non profit based.  Imagine the difference it would make to the economy and profit for, all never mind those on low incomes such as pensioners.

Please look into the different global policies on this and make a difference for the good.
